author: andschwa
body: The correct use of a PowerShell host is that, given somescript.ps1, it's filename is added via powershell.AddScript somescript.ps1 , also wise to resolve said filename. Made   file do the same. Made *.ps1 scripts recognized as such when run like `powershell.exe somescript.ps1`  deprecating the explicit need for   file . VSO create date - 11/5/2015 9:36:00     VSO closed date - 11/5/2015 9:38:00
title: Execute *.ps1 scripts as actual scripts.
